name: Krevil May Die
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 - Roll of the Dice

Inspired by the concept of critical successes and failures found in TTRPGs.

Take on the evil jester horde as Krevil, wielder of the die-blade! Run, dash, slash and blast your way through your foes. The longer your combo string, the more likely you are to unleash devastating blast attacks! But beware, your blast attack will also be more likely to backfire, with dangerous consequences...
